name: Rice
description: A staple food for a large portion of the world's population.

name: Corn
description: Used for livestock feed, ethanol production, and human consumption.

name: Wheat
description: A major ingredient in bread, pasta, and other baked goods.

name: Soybeans
description: Used for oil extraction, animal feed, and soy-based products.

name: Coffee
description: A popular beverage made from roasted coffee beans.

name: Sugar
description: Used as a sweetener in various food and beverage products.

name: Cotton
description: A natural fiber used in the textile industry.

name: Crude Oil
description: A fossil fuel used for energy production and various industrial processes.

name: Gold
description: A precious metal used as a store of value and in jewelry.

name: Silver
description: A precious metal used in jewelry, electronics, and industrial applications.
